description:
Gokudo goes on stage and causes a complete ruckus and the audience rushes forward for autographs, leaving them no choice but to fight their way out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La presentación de las hermanas Chingentzai.
Miwaku no Chingentsuai Sisters! Toujou no Koto
The Trembling Debut of the Bok Choy Sisters!
魅惑のチンゲンツァイシスターズ!登場 のこと
